website_summaries.verdict: Versatile and large sized bottle for skincare and kitchen use.
pros: No hexane is used in extraction process
A generous offering of cold-pressed grapeseed oil that is suitable for oil baths, daily cooking use, or wherever large amounts of oil are needed
cons: The lack of a handle on the large bottle may make it hard to pour

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing!!!!!! Lightweight for the hair which is perfect for my bouncy curls and twists. I definitely will buy more, instantly removes dark circles and bags under my eyes. We can see a difference in just one week! Smells delicious like a fresh floral perfume!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Asha Aziza Peterson

customer_reviews.title: and is perfect for high temperature cooking that would denature and degrade ...
customer_reviews.text: This is cold-pressed, not chemically extracted, and is perfect for high temperature cooking that would denature and degrade other oils, like olive oil. Keep it in the frig after opening, and it will stay fresh for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just received my oil and it’s not like in the picture above.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product does not have a standard labelling.  Organic or not Organic ?
customer_reviews.text: First I had ordered this item in May and as you can see in the photo the can on the right says Organic. Then reordered the same item from my order history, today the item arrives and as you can see the can on the left does not say organic. The old can on the right is darker in color. The new can on the left has a lighter shade.
customer_reviews.author: Billi

customer_reviews.title: Cold pressed Grapeseed Oil
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this oil because it was the only one that was cold pressed. Grapeseed oil has so many benefits and it is a light oil which is nice to mix with water to make a good dressing for salads. The packaging could use an upgrade so the cap doesn’t break during shipping other than that I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Weaver/Milwaukee WI

customer_reviews.title: No kitchen should be without this excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Never really knew that Grape seed oil was really better for cooking than olive oil. I’ve used this everyday for higher temp cooking on the stove and on the grill. This oil is truly a great product no real aftertaste like olive oil and it really doesn’t smoke at higher temps.I made the switch to good stainless steel cookware and adding this Naked oil enhances the flavor profiles of what you cook.
customer_reviews.author: Chazzer

customer_reviews.title: 5/5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: I use this on occasion as a face rub and on wounds. After I put it on I get a nice feeling, like my body needed the nutrients. I also feel like the next couple of days my face is radiant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has many uses
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I use it for my daughter's long hair. It makes her hair look shiny and healthy. I also use it for my scabby hands from scratching. It helps to heal the scabs and softens my skin. It has no smell or odor. I will keep ordering it.
customer_reviews.author: Ma Xiong

customer_reviews.title: I like it as a makeup remover
customer_reviews.text: I actually use this to remove my eye makeup. This oil is great at removing my eye makeup and mascara. After rinsing the most I can off with warm water, I gently use makeup remover to get any left over residue. My lashes feel more hydrated and conditioned removing eye makeup this way. I’ve also used it on my face but the residue is harder to get off my face than my eyes for some reason. But it doesn’t break my face out either (very cystic acne prone). BUT if I do use it on my face I do the oil, then makeup remover for the residue, THEN my face wash.
customer_reviews.author: Amberlee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for frying eggs or anything else. Does not smoke and imparts no flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Hambone

customer_reviews.title: smelled Rancid
customer_reviews.text: I had bought from this brand before and initially felt the quality for price was good but after the purchase I feel disappointed. The product smelled horrible after I opened it and had only used it a few times. I tried to add essential oils to see if I could blend it out and still use it but unfortunately it didn't help and now I have a huge jug of oil that is useless to me or anyone else. I hope they can get on their quality because this just should not happen.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: my face feels and looks good. I have been told how hydrated my face ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this product on my face, it goes on oily but gets absorbed quickly, my face feels and looks good. I have been told how hydrated my face looks and wanted to know what moisturizer I was using. This oil is great. I have used many different brand name moisturizers and by the end of the day my face felt tight and looked dry.
customer_reviews.author: Anita D. Zambrano

customer_reviews.title: Ugh..
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with cap cracked and spilled.. can’t say if it’s good or not because I’m nervous to use it. Really disappointed. Would like a replacement and hopefully have a better experience and accurate feedback on the product itself vs. poor shipping. The other part of the cap wasn’t in the box so hoping they didn’t send it with the seal broken and not notice 😔
customer_reviews.author: Kendell

customer_reviews.title: Get ready for Grapeseed.... oil
customer_reviews.text: The seeds of these grapes must have been made with unicorn blood cause this stuff is silky smooth unreal!
customer_reviews.author: Don Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: The smell is a bit nutty and can be a little off putting for someone not used to it. It’s not as offensive as other oils I’ve used though. There’s no weird flavors when using it to cook but I don’t like that there is no nutritional info/food label on the bottle given it’s supposed to be food grade. I use it to oil cleanse so I can smell it when rubbing it on my face but when I wipe the excess oil off, the smell goes away. Overall it’s a good product and I would consider purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Teena

customer_reviews.title: Pure and clean
customer_reviews.text: Oil pulling I put it on in the morning and night. Instead of washing my face , it pulled alls the impurities out of my face leaving it extremely smooth and clean . Just put it on and put a steaming hot rag over your face.
customer_reviews.author: Angela kelson

customer_reviews.title: Product came without sprayer and had particles floating around
customer_reviews.text: This Grapeseed oil came without sprayer shown in picture, had particles floating around in the bottle and the seal was not attached. Sent back immediately for refund. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Logan-Hearn

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy. Its not Grapeseed oil
customer_reviews.text: This product should be taken off amazon. Its basically cooking/vegetable oil sold really pricy.. So disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. I use this for everything from my sugar/salt scrubs and as a carrier oil for my essential oil recipes that are topical as well as internal since it is food grade. I will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: R L C

customer_reviews.title: You will glow!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my body after stepping out the shower. Ill never be without it now. Its amazing and i think i prefer it slightly over my sweet almond oil. Which i loveeee.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna

customer_reviews.title: Great Oil for your skin
customer_reviews.text: This oils works great! It does wonders for my skin
customer_reviews.author: Podoleo

customer_reviews.title: Great Oil
customer_reviews.text: I use this oil as an ingredient for my beard oil, it works wonders and you get so much, i wish they had an ingredient label on it but the front reads 100 percent pure grapeseed oil, will buy again if i ever run out
customer_reviews.author: walter thorpe

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!!!
customer_reviews.text: Cold pressed ensure all phytonutrients are bioavsilable. A healthy " oil"...ONLY IF COLD PRESSED. Higher sautee temperature than cold pressed olive oil for cooking.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Great on my skin!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't cooked with this brand. I purchased it as a skin moisturizer. It is awesome, absorbs quickly in the skin, leaving it silky smooth. I also use it on my face and hair. My recipe....... add a few drops of Eucalyptus and Spearmint oils in it and BAM!!! You don't even need deodorant!
customer_reviews.author: John-Jenn Creations

customer_reviews.title: this grape seed oil is GREAT, I mix it with my daily face moisturizer ...
customer_reviews.text: this grape seed oil is GREAT, I mix it with my daily face moisturizer and lotion. I use it as a deep conditioner. its worth it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: PromisesK

customer_reviews.title: which is not great. Otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted the Grapeseed oil option. Something must be wrong with the spray function. it comes out in just a stream, not a spray, which is not great. Otherwise, could be great.
customer_reviews.author: jbfl

customer_reviews.title: Absorbs well and non greasy feeling
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Nice oil used it for a homemade hair oil.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Great company.
customer_reviews.text: Best quality oil I could find. I use it cosmetically for my skin, and cook with it as well. Has a very high smoke point. I would, and have recommended this product.
customer_reviews.author: High Expectations

customer_reviews.title: Great for Moisturizing Oil Blends
customer_reviews.text: Used this oil to create natural, herbal hair oil blends! Worked great as a base and mixed well with jojoba oil. I will purchase this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Tarra T!

customer_reviews.title: Light-tasting oil, easy to cook with
customer_reviews.text: My first time using grape seed oil. It has been a good experience!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Yet another broken cap. Leaked oil all over package.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a broken cap. Poorly packaged. Oil leaked all over the other items in the box. Can’t use the oil now due to broken cap. Also, bottle is cheap/thin/flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: C N

customer_reviews.title: Many uses; skin, hair, nails, carrying oil, even cooking. I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using the grapeseed oil on my skin along with other oils. Lightly applied, it absorbs into the skin well, and, has aided in clearing redness and breakouts, and also, has managed my oily skin very well. Searching for grapeseed capsules(used in the past for breakouts) I saw the oil and decided to try it, happy I did!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Very good to cook with. Very nice on the skin. Less wrinkles overtime
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product. Doesn't smoke when used frying. Good on the skin. Moisturize.
customer_reviews.author: Cooloff12

customer_reviews.title: Rip-off
customer_reviews.text: Was supposed to have a sprayer. Not included. Could have purchased twice as much of the same brand for a couple of extra bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago Vegan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: An excellent host product for body paint powder. It goes on smoothly and evens out extremely well. It's a bit runny but for a still shoot it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Andre E. King

customer_reviews.title: Great grape seed oil!
customer_reviews.text: This has a subtle, very nice flavor; tastes fresh & real. Cooks well. Good as salad dressing, or nutritional uses.
customer_reviews.author: Chi

customer_reviews.title: Buy it all the time as a carrier oil for EO’s
customer_reviews.text: I buy this regularly as a carrier oil. Good price, works well. Recommend. Great as a moisturizer too.
customer_reviews.author: Lbeckit

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff for frying, for face, in recipes! Healthy and high smoke point. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: The Lilac Poet

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: I loved the oil and used it on my arms, legs, chest, and face for approximately 2weeks. But I started noticing red sores on my legs and breakouts on my legs. I must have been allergic to it and had to stop using it. But for anyone else, I think it’s a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Susie S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: First time buying this product. Pure looking and smelling, feels great on my skin!
customer_reviews.author: Missy W.

customer_reviews.title: Best oil for frying.
customer_reviews.text: It has no taste. It is for frying as it has high temperature tolerance.
customer_reviews.author: Ketabkhoon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: We use the oil for cooking and skin moisturizing. It feels great on the skin, not greasy and tastes better than olive oil for cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Wellnitz

customer_reviews.title: no sprayer
customer_reviews.text: There was no sprayer. The oil seems fine, but I wanted to spray it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Watered down
customer_reviews.text: Watered down, When I first got one it was ok, then after I Subscribed it was watered down.
customer_reviews.author: yolandra

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Lots of product for the price which I love! And it's odor free and didn't leak in the box. Arrived very quickly
customer_reviews.author: mcrosie

customer_reviews.title: Happy  First Time Grapeseeder
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time cooking with Grapeseed oil. It’s the best!!!! Great flavor that doesn’t overwhelm any food. This will be a forever food. I purchased this brand because after research I found that cold pressed is best.
customer_reviews.author: Meggie

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy by the gallon
customer_reviews.text: Used half of it befor it went rancid and spoiled..standard shelf life is 6 months. Bought it 2 months ago today. Very very unsatisfactory.... Paid 50$ for a gallon
customer_reviews.author: Randy Nevitt

customer_reviews.title: So moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I tried giving it 5 stars but I couldn’t seem to correct it. It moisturized and absorbs beautifully into the skin on my legs!
customer_reviews.author: Owner of cat Princess

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Light weight oil. Easy to use. Improvement in skin right away.
customer_reviews.author: veronica lohrer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Very fine taste and truly lightweight fir a teaspoon a week...
customer_reviews.author: Afrikaren Plazdohtifaw deCarriere

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Like the way it feels after I clean my face!

customer_reviews.title: Short a few ounces I’m very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: The product was short a few ounces I’m very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for your money
customer_reviews.text: I got my product on time and I love it!!!!! Thank you

customer_reviews.title: Stinky
customer_reviews.text: It stinks! Cannot use as intended for hair and skin

customer_reviews.title: I appreciate that it’s a high temperature oil.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is a high temperature oil and that it is flavorless.

customer_reviews.title: Still working with the product and so far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Timely delivery. Still working with the product and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B.

customer_reviews.title: Good oil
customer_reviews.text: Good body oil have not cooked with it yet . Kind of pricey though.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Grows my hair so fast and also works good for my face doesn’t clog my pores
customer_reviews.author: antoinette

customer_reviews.title: Great for body moisturizer and great for scars, acne, and dark spots
customer_reviews.text: Believe it or not we use grapeseed oil as a moisturizer on our skin.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Carlson

customer_reviews.title: the spray does not fit the bottle
customer_reviews.text: the spray mechanism does not fit on the bottle. So it is useless.
customer_reviews.author: James Fishkin

customer_reviews.title: This oil is not greasy nor heavy on the skin ...
customer_reviews.text: This oil is not greasy nor heavy on the skin. It keeps your skin very moisturize all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good portion of the oil was spilled out when I ...
customer_reviews.text: A good portion of the oil was spilled out when I received it. The cap was broken. I’m afraid to use it since the oil may be contaminated. Did not receive what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't smell fresh, not as pleasant a taste as we have experienced with others.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Very good oil
customer_reviews.text: Really good oil. I have put some in my body oil and have cooked with it.
customer_reviews.author: P. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Organic or Not? 8/31/18 and still no follow up on my question?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a gallon of this “organic” grape seed oil but nowhere on the bottle or label do I see organic. Your ad photo and discription say otherwise, please explain....
customer_reviews.author: H.T

customer_reviews.title: they love how good it makes their hair feel
customer_reviews.text: I am an loctician and I use his oil on my clients. they love how good it makes their hair feel. I will continue to buy this product
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R Davis

customer_reviews.title: Best skin moisturizer ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been mixing 1 oz glycerin along with 7 oz of grape seed oil for several years as an after bath moisturizer. This concoction has improved my skin texture immensely and results began within the first month. My skin hasn’t aged and I receive compliments regularly. For those who are wondering, I’m 48 and my skin looks like it did in my 20s.
customer_reviews.author: Agent Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great for skin and hair
customer_reviews.text: So far we have used this only for skin and hair application and it’s great. My husband likes it’s smell and says it feels good - he uses it in his hair. I like using it on my skin after showering, it soaks in nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Heather L.

customer_reviews.title: I love love love using grape seed oil as a moisturizer ...
customer_reviews.text: I love love love using grape seed oil as a moisturizer it goes on easy and soaks in quickly it's one of my favorite things that have a bought. I have used it as a carrier oil and it is wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Paulette

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: Nice. I use it as a carrier oil and it works well. I also like to spray it on straight after a shower.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for massage oil base
customer_reviews.text: Great carrier base oil for massage. Just add some drops of essential oil and mix in small bottle or old rinsed out soap dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: Martin W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tasteless but very odd smoooooth texture. Hubs directed to take by doctor as part of Mediterranean diet.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen B.

customer_reviews.title: I've not found a good oil sprayer yet
customer_reviews.text: And this is no exception. Oil is fine, but pump just sprays out a stream of oil. This must be why Pam is still a thing. Nobody can come up with a decent sprayer for plain oil without all sorts of additives.
customer_reviews.author: Rob P.

customer_reviews.title: More of a squirt than a spray
customer_reviews.text: The grapeseed oil is good stuff. The sprayer leaves a lot to be desired. The pump delivers a hard narrow stream to the point of deducting a star in the rating. Time to find another sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: Southern VetTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: ♥️
customer_reviews.text: Use this twice a day for facial moisturizer...leaves my skin feeling soft..I love it
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: No smoke no taste no worries
customer_reviews.text: So far in the last few years of grapeseed oil use this is only the second one to warrant being in our kitchen rotation of multiple purchases.
customer_reviews.author: R.AMSEY

customer_reviews.title: This will be a steady repeat purchase !
customer_reviews.text: I’m very picky about anything I use holistically and researched this brand before I bought it . One of the best I have ever used . I would pick this over any other brand
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Amazing buy
customer_reviews.text: The best kind of oil I was looking for. Good for frying, salads. Light with pure aroma. Will get more of it

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected..
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting true grapeseed oil no scent and that's exactly what I got. Very please with product.

customer_reviews.title: Never tried it before
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a carrier oil for shea butter because it is thinner than normal

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and bulk size
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and fresh oil for anything in kitchen and beautiful! Love the bulk size and I poured it into a glass bottle for easier use daily.

customer_reviews.title: This did not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I lost an entire batch of soap using this oil. This did not work for me....

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for providing a quality product at a great price

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really like it. It really does have a high heat tolerance. excellent frying.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the skin
customer_reviews.text: This oil is great for massages. Makes your skin feel so soft.

customer_reviews.text: This is my go to oil for everything! Great for cooking or drizzling on veggies.

customer_reviews.title: Great high temp Oil
customer_reviews.text: This has now become a regular buy for me. We buy this every 2 to 3 months.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Mild taste, very simple presentation, strong plastic bottle. It is a plus that this is cold distilled.

customer_reviews.title: Great carrier oil!!

product_meta.title: GrapeSeed Oil-Cold Pressed, Virgin, Undiluted, 100% Pure Grape Seed Oil (32 Ounce)
feature_bullets: 100% Pure, Cold Pressed, Virgin, Undiluted GrapeSeed Oil from NakedOil
FOR SKIN: Acne, Skin Tightening, Minimizes Under-Eye Circles, Moisturizing, Assist with Aging Skin
FOR HAIR: Moisturizes The Scalp And Hair, Aids Dandruff, Adds Shine To Hair, Helps Strengthen Hair.
FOR HEALTH: Hypoallergenic, Rich in Antioxidants, Rich in Essential Fatty Acids Has a relatively high smoke point so is Great for cooking with high temperatures
